description:
Kosaka has made a new friend, Seiya. Unfortunately for Shinozaki this opens up a lot of new feelings and he can’t quite keep his jealousy in check.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: D-Don`t Show This to Anyone Else, Okay?
Ho, Hoka no Hito ni wa Misenaide ne?
Ne montre ça à personne d`autre, d`accord ?
Z… zeig das aber keinem anderen, okay?
ほ, 他の人には見せないでね?
